item.title: Alyssa Eurice living her dreams and overcoming all odds despite having four heart surgeries
item.description: This week’s ABC7 Athlete of the Week is Alyssa Eurice. She’s a senior and one of the star volleyball players of the Bradenton Christian School (BCS) Lady Panthers.

item.title: Fire caused by lightning destroys barn in Charlotte County
item.description: No people were inside, but one dog died in the blaze, while another escaped safely.

item.title: UPDATE: Special Marine Warning issued for Sarasota and Gulf waters as storm threatens waterspouts
item.description: Waterspouts can quickly form and capsize boats, damage vessels, and create suddenly higher waves.

item.title: New findings by NASA Mars rover provide strongest hints yet of potential signs of ancient life
item.description: NASA’s Mars rover Perseverance has uncovered rocks in a dry river channel that may hold potential signs of ancient microscopic life, scientists reported Wednesday.

item.title: Sarasota man sentenced to 8 life sentences after violently raping multiple women on same night
item.description: "These two women suffered the worst sort of violence imaginable and somehow found the strength to survive and escape.”

item.title: Parents and students give their final say on Wellen Park High School redistricting
item.description: School attendance zone boundary changes will impact North Port High School, Venice High School, Heron Creek Middle School, and Venice Middle School.

item.title: Stormy today and tomorrow, then a drier Suncoast
Manatee County School Board finalizes $245K contract with new Superintendent Laurie Breslin
item.description: Breslin replaces Dr. Jason Wysong, who was removed earlier this year.
